email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN PRIDE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN PRIDE (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 150,000 MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN PRIDE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the quote. USD 18.50 per MT seems a bit high. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN PRIDE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN PRIDE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 18.00 per MT is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75 per MT? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 October?

Cheers,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN PRIDE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 17.75 per MT is possible. Laycan adjusted to 17-22 October. Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN PRIDE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN PRIDE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN PRIDE
- Cargo: 150,000 MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 17-22 October
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah
